spells.html_content:
Spells

Protective Glyph
/ Blinding Glyph
1 - 3 Range / 3AP

Inflicts Earth damage on enemies and places a glyph-aura under the target that reduces damage suffered by allies.

Prevents the use of other elemental glyphs in the same turn.
Required level: :
165

Normal effects

31 to 35 (Earth damage)
Places a glyph-aura (1 turn)

Critical effects

37 to 42 (Earth damage)
Places a glyph-aura (1 turn)

Other characteristics

Probability of Critical Hit
5%
Uses per turn
1
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes
Area of Effect
Circle of 2 cells

spells.html_content:
Spells

Ataraxia
/ Reinforced Protection
3 Range / 2AP

Applies the Gravity state on the targeted ally and reduces all types of damage suffered on the first attack.
The effects of the spell are removed if the ally suffers damage.

Interception and damage-sharing effects are incompatible with the spell.
The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
185

Normal effects

'Gravity' state (1 turn)
'Ataraxia' state (1 turn)
x25% damage sustained

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
2
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

/ Feca Shield

Applies the Gravity state in an area of effect and increases the caster's Lock for each enemy in the area of effect.
The Gravity state does not affect the caster.
